content.query:
SELECT 
                t1.EventID,
                t1.EventType,
                t1.StartDateOfEvent,
                t2.AppealRefNumber,
                t3.SiteAddress1
                
FROM            casework_event_fact t1
INNER JOIN      casework_event_dim t2 
ON              t1.EventID = t2.EventID
INNER JOIN      casework_case_fact t3
ON              t2.CaseReference = t3.CaseReference
